jobDescription:
Industrial Control and Drives India Private Limited is looking for Software Application Developer to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  1. Modifying software to fix errors, adapt it to new hardware, improve its performance, or upgrade interfaces.
  2. Directing system testing and validation procedures.

  4. Consulting with departments or customers on project status and proposals.

title: Application Developer & Web Technologies Professional
jobDescription:
• We are currently seeking an experienced Application Developer & Web Technologies professional to join our team
  • The successful candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-quality web applications using programming languages such as Java and SQL
  • They will collaborate with cross-functional teams to analyze user requirements, troubleshoot issues, and ensure the smooth execution of projects
  • Additionally, the candidate will need to have strong problem-solving, analytical, and teamwork skills

Candidate Qualifications

  • They should possess excellent adaptability, problem-solving, analytical, and teamwork skills
  • Good communication skills are also essential for effective collaboration with team members and stakeholders

Required Skills:-

  • SQL
  • Adaptability
  • Problem
  • Solving
  • Analytical Skills
  • Teamwork
  • Good Communication

We are looking for a C# developer responsible for building C# applications, including anything from back-end services to their client-end counterparts. Your primary responsibilities will be to design and develop these applications, and to coordinate with the rest of the team working on different layers of the infrastructure.   • Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable C# code

title: Senior Application Developer
jobDescription:
• Application Development role requires creating and managing technological infrastructure of an application, be in-charge / involved in architecting, building, and managing application flows, construct data storages, incorporate business logic and enable user experience to manage business processes and functions

Role Responsibility:

  • Translate functional specifications and change requests into technical specifications
  • Translate business requirement document, functional specification, and technical specification to related coding
  • Develop best in class UX designs
  • Develop efficient code with unit testing and code documentation
  • Ensuring accuracy and integrity of data and applications through analysis, coding, documenting, testing, and problem solving
  • Setting up the development environment and configuration of the development tools
  • Communicate with all the project stakeholders on the project status
  • Manage, monitor, and ensure the security and privacy of data to satisfy business needs
  • Contribute to the automation of modules, wherever required
  • To be proficient in written, verbal and presentation communication (English)
  • Co-ordinating with the UAT team

Role Requirement:

  • Proficient in basic and advanced SQL programming concepts, like Stored Procedures
  • Proficient in developing business applications using waterfall and agile methodologies
  • Knowledgeable in relational databases, nonrelational databases, data streams, and file stores
  • Knowledgeable in performance tuning and optimization
  • Experience in Data Profiling and Data validation
  • Experience in requirements gathering and documentation processes and performing unit testing
  • Understanding and Implementing QA and various testing process in the project
  • Sound aptitude, outstanding logical reasoning, and analytical skills
  • Willingness to learn and take initiatives
  • Ability to work with a diverse team and adapt to fast-paced Agile environment

Additional Requirement:

  • Excellent coding skills in .NET MVC
  • Good knowledge in Core 6.0, entity framework, MVC
    AJAX, WCF, Javascript, JQuery, Windows Workflow Foundation and other scripting languages
  • Extensive experience in WEB API PL/SQL/ Entity framework and should have good knowledge of any Database Knowledge in Json, XML, CSS, Kendo UI, Angular JS, Azure, Cloud Server will be an added advantage.
  • Knowledge in any of the ETL / Reporting tool is a plus.

title: Job Opening - Dot Net Developer / Tech Lead - 6 Openings

placeholders.label: Hybrid - Navi Mumbai, Thane, Mumbai (All Areas)

jobDescription:
Hi


Greetings from Alianza Consultants!!


We have openings for the Position of Dot Net Developers / Tech Leads for Multiple IT Clients for Mumbai Location.


Location - Mumbai


Openings - 2 positions (Asp.Net MVC)

6 positions (Asp.Net Core)



Working Days - 5 days (Day Shift)


Experience - 2+ years (Mid-level) & 4+ years (Sr. Level) & 6+ years (Tech Lead)


Job Description:

  • Proficient with Microsoft .NET (and .NET Core) development using C#
  • Tightly integrate authentication and business logic using the capabilities of the MVC framework
  • Design, implement and integrate with Web services; Desirable exposure to WCF or Web services
  • Create scalable web applications with best- in- class UX; good working knowledge of HTML5/CSS/JavaScript.
  • Working knowledge on DB Sql programming. Ability to understand and work with large, complex code base.
  • Expertise in performance and security aspects of web applications. Excellent analytical and debugging skills.
  • Browser / client-side development on JavaScript (or its libraries such as JQuery).
  • Hands-on experience in Multithreading, Concurrent Programming, Parallel Programming, Async programming
  • Hands-on experience in SOAP & REST Services
  • Experience with user interface design and prototyping
  • Experience using Jira tool
  • Experience designing and developing enterprise grade software
  • Experience with source control management systems and continuous integration/deployment environments
  • Expertise in performance and security aspects of web applications
  • Excellent analytical and debugging Skills
  • Good communication and problem-solving skills.
  • Should be a self-starter and should have the ability to work under pressure

Key Skills:

Asp .Net, MVC, WCF, JQuery, JavaScript, C#, HTML5 & CSS3, SQL Server, Entity Framework, AngularJS


Opportunities for Candidates:


  • Flexi Work hours
  • Health insurance & Provident Fund
  • Employee friendly workspace
  • Saturday and Sunday fixed week off
  • Be a part of core technical team
  • Get a chance to face US Clients
  • Chance to visit US at client's office
  • Grow with the company


If interested, revert us with your updated CV and information below:


Total Experience -

Experience in Asp.Net Webforms -

Experience in MVC -

Experience in Asp.Net Core / Dot Net Core -

CTC -

Offer (If Any) -

Expected CTC -

Notice Period -

If Serving, LWD -

Your Location -

Comfortable to relocate to Mumbai - Yes / No?



Mail us your applications along with your CVs to jobs@alianzaconsultants.com
